exercise.title: MS12_020 Exploit
exercise.name: ms12_020
exercise.description: Exploit a Windows 7 machine with RDP running.
exercise.tutorial:
1. On your defensive workstation enable RDP, if it is not already enabled.
  2. ssh into the Kali workstation.
    1. 192.20.128.11 with creds: root | P@ssw0rd
  3. Launch the msfconsole
  4. search for the module containing 'ms12_020'.
  5. set the module.
  6. Set the appropriate options
  7. Exploit
